title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.12 - On-site inspections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.12 - On-site inspections

State Regulations
(a) Right to
inspect. The division shall have the right to conduct on-site inspections to
evaluate the certified provider's performance in delivering the program in
accordance with its application and this Part. (b) Barring access. Refusal to provide the
division with access for the purpose of such inspection may result in
termination of certification in accordance with section
343.15
of this Part of denial of
renewal of certification in accordance with section
343.14
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
343.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
